ygData.subject: Don't mess with me!
ygData.msgSnippet: * Iron Raptor glared at the screen after Megatron laughed at her, her fists clenched at her sides. How dare he! She just wished that he was there right now so

Subject: Don't mess with me!

From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>


* Iron Raptor glared at the screen after Megatron laughed at her, her fists 
clenched at her sides.
How dare he! She just wished that he was there right now so she could 
strangle his throat!
CRASH!
Glass shattered everywhere and Iron drew her fist back from the console 
screen, but by then the conversation had ended and screen had gone black.*

" Well, SCREW you TOO!"

* She shouted before whipping around and storming out of the room, deciding 
to not even bother to clean up because the ship was enough in shambls that a 
shattered screen looked common place.
That was another thing that made her angry.
Yet, instead of heading right outside Iron headed towards the armoury, 
throwing open the door and searching through the room for pieces to portable 
autoguns.
Grabbing a large sack at the door when she walked in, she started grabbing 
pieces from shelves and throwing them into it, taking power sources and 
placing them into the sack too.
Now with what she needed she was about to walk out of the room but stopped 
when she saw a portable shield...or rather a couple. Grabbing them as well 
she headed out of the room with the sack over her shoulder and towards the 
base doors.
Someone had to get things going right out there and a little extra firepower 
never hurt anyone...except the enemy.
Reaching the doors she exited and looked around that the battle, moving out 
towards it a bit before going off to the side and then setting the sack 
down, taking out a shield. Looking it over she activated it and then set it 
down infront of her, then began work on constructing the first autogun.
Her thoughts already telling Prowl that she was out there and what she was 
up to.*
